body_html: @soumith On a broader side, I think SpectralNorm power iteration code and this new Conv layer treatment should be factored out from the current SpectralNorm place to a more accessible generic torch namespace (or maybe some new torch.spectral namespace, but svd lives in torch, so not sure).
body_text: @soumith On a broader side, I think SpectralNorm power iteration code and this new Conv layer treatment should be factored out from the current SpectralNorm place to a more accessible generic torch namespace (or maybe some new torch.spectral namespace, but svd lives in torch, so not sure).
body: @soumith On a broader side, I think SpectralNorm power iteration code and this new Conv layer treatment should be factored out from the current SpectralNorm place to a more accessible generic torch namespace (or maybe some new torch.spectral namespace, but svd lives in torch, so not sure).
